A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The Last Jedi was a massive marketing tease followed by zero payoff. In an effort to play it safe Disney neglected to create a cohesive storyline that could hook viewers for the inevitable sequel. I could go on about the many flaws of the film but I'm sure other fans have already done so adequately. I will state that I appreciated the diverse cast but loath how that cast was utilized. I get the feeling that Disney wants to blame the poor viewer reviews on bigotry\, but no such malice is required to dislike this film.
